attributes.action: To make Bebo a bit more safer for teenagers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bebo isnt as safe as people think it is.  No-one is real.  There are thousands of Bebo fakes and Bebo will do nothing about it.  I Want there to be a law on stealing peoples pictures on the internet.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
